body:
Please follow the below steps to learn how to revoke and remove access to a test you shared with users and teams.

Prerequisites

  • You must have created the test and shared it with users or teams.

Steps

  1. Click on the Tests tab on the home page and then click the test name which you want to share.
The HackerRank Tests page
  1. In the left navigation pane, click on the Share Test option.
"Share" option to share the Test with other users
  1. Perform one of the following operations:
  If you want to... Then...
A Remove access of a test from a team In the Shared Teams section, click Remove for the team from which you want to revoke the access.
B Remove access of a test from a user In the Shared Users section, click Remove for the user from whom you want to revoke the access.

Selecting teams or users to share the Test
title: Revoking Access to a Shared Test
